channel.title: 2021 on Leipzig Gophers
channel.description: Recent content in 2021 on Leipzig Gophers

item.description: Unfortunately, most of the meetups were remote-only again in 2021 - however, on the plus side: we started the year with a new Leipzig Gopher mascot - thanks @klingtnet we grew from 194 to 324 members in just eleven months ğŸ“ˆ we had nine events, eight online, one offline (#20) we had presentations from two German startup companies (#22, #23) we started a YouTube channel (thanks @embano1), recorded three great talks (18 subscribers, 330+ views) ğŸ“¹ we had a first (X-mas ğŸ„) quiz night (#24) on Go and some Go gotchas and found great sponsors like Jetbrains, O’Reilly Media, Manning Publications and About You (jobs) ğŸ we continued to have people joining from around the world, which is incredible ğŸŒ we had a lovely time hosting the meetup and hope you had that too Thanks everyone for participating, we hope to see you again in 2022!

item.title: New year, new dates, new logo!
item.description: Thanks everyone for joining our meetup (we currently have 194 members), connecting, sharing experiences and projects in 2020. A positive side-effect of remote meetups during a pandemic is that people join from all over the world - we were happy to have people tuning in from South America and Asia this year. We expect a remote only meetup for the foreseeable future. So far we fixed six dates for 2021, and they will all be on Tuesdays this year.
